problem_text: A square is inscribed in a circle of area 18 \pi square units. Find the length of a side of the square.
source: Textbook 2_Chapter 11 - Areas of Polygons and Circles.pdf
compact_text: A square is inscribed in a circle of area 18\pi square units. Find the length of a side of the square.
annotat_text: A square is inscribed in a circle of area 18$\pi$ square units. Find the length of a side of the square.
